text: Larry King Live was an American television talk show hosted by Larry King on CNN from 1985 to 2010. It was the network's most watched and longest-running program, with over one million viewers nightly. On June 29, 2010, Larry King announced that the program would end. The last episode aired on December 16, 2010, and a new episode on the war against cancer aired two days later on December 18. ==References== Category:1985 American television series debuts Category:2010 American television series endings Category:American television talk shows Category:CNN
title: Larry King Live
